readable.title: 3183195185_cd0ff994a1
readable.content: A man and a boy sitting with their back to a stone wall , the man paying a flute . A man and a small boy sit and rest against a stone wall . A man holding a flute and a boy sit on a street against a red wall . Man and young child sitting on the ground in front of red rock wall . The man and boy sit on the ground , next to a rocky wall .
